name: Rewardz
description: Headquartered in Singapore and with a growing footprint spanning over 30 countries, we couple innovative Rewards-as-a-Service technology with our extensive and relevant reward marketplace to meet all your incentive needs. Offering both cloud-based mobile and web platforms and plug-in solutions, we have served over 250 clients and 1.5 million users. Be it motivating employees, building customer loyalty, raising sales performance or fostering a culture of wellness, our platforms are easy to use, fun and relevant.

enhanced_description: Rewardz is a Singapore-headquartered HR technology provider specializing in incentive and recognition solutions, with a growing global footprint spanning over 30 countries. It offers a Rewards-as-a-Service platform, accessible via cloud-based mobile and web platforms, as well as plug-in solutions. Having served over 250 clients and 1.5 million users, Rewardz empowers organizations to easily reward and recognize employees, build customer loyalty, raise sales performance, and foster a culture of wellness. The platform focuses on providing real, visible, and meaningful recognition through an extensive and relevant reward marketplace, offering curated local and global rewards tailored to align with corporate objectives.
competitive_advantages: Extensive and relevant global reward marketplace
